sql.query:
SELECT user_tpin
FROM m_users AS m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */

SELECT tt_recharge_trans.id, tt_recharge_trans.op_id, tt_recharge_trans.service_id, tt_recharge_trans.api_id, tt_recharge_trans.user_id, tt_recharge_trans.user_number, tt_recharge_trans.details, tt_recharge_trans.opening_balance, tt_recharge_trans.amount, tt_recharge_trans.comm_per, tt_recharge_trans.comm_val, tt_recharge_trans.comm_amt, tt_recharge_trans.other_charge, tt_recharge_trans.charge_per, tt_recharge_trans.charge_amt, tt_recharge_trans.net_amt, tt_recharge_trans.closing_balance, tt_recharge_trans.tr_mode, tt_recharge_trans.tr_type, tt_recharge_trans.status, tt_recharge_trans.tr_id, tt_recharge_trans.reason, tt_recharge_trans.api_logs, tt_recharge_trans.is_processed, tt_recharge_trans.operator_ref, tt_recharge_trans.api_ref, tt_recharge_trans.revert_trans, tt_recharge_trans.ip_address, tt_recharge_trans.api_response_id, tt_recharge_trans.process_mode, tt_recharge_trans.live, tt_recharge_trans.tr_date, tt_recharge_trans.updated_on, tt_recharge_trans.transaction_by, tt_recharge_trans.extra1, tt_recharge_trans.extra2, tt_recharge_trans.extra3, tt_recharge_trans.dtcommper, tt_recharge_trans.dtcommval, tt_recharge_trans.dtcommamt, tt_recharge_trans.dtchargeper, tt_recharge_trans.dtchargeval, tt_recharge_trans.dtchargeamt, tt_recharge_trans.mdtcommper, tt_recharge_trans.mdtcommval, tt_recharge_trans.mdtcommamt, tt_recharge_trans.mdtchargeper, tt_recharge_trans.mdtchargeval, tt_recharge_trans.mdtchargeamt, mu.user_fname, mu.user_lname, mu.user_mobile, mu.user_email, mu.user_type, mu.md_id, mu.ds_id, mu.u_status, mu.scheme_id, mu.balance_amt, mu.cap_amt, mu.balance_outstanding, mu.aeps_limit, mu.aeps_balance
FROM tt_recharge_trans AS tt_recharge_trans
INNER JOIN m_users AS mu ON (mu.id = tt_recharge_trans.user_id)
WHERE tt_recharge_trans.id = :P1 /* {{tr_id}} */

SELECT callbackapi
FROM t_api_token
WHERE user_id = :P1 /* {{GetRechTrans.user_id}} */

UPDATE tt_recharge_trans
SET status = :P1 /* {{$_POST.tr_status}} */, live = :P2 /* {{'Push'}} */, updated_on = :P3 /* {{NOW}} */, operator_ref = :P4 /* {{'Transaction Successful'}} */
WHERE id = :P5 /* {{GetRechTrans.id}} */

UPDATE tt_balance
SET updated_on = :P1 /* {{NOW}} */, status = :P2 /* {{$_POST.tr_status}} */, deleted_by = :P3 /* {{identity}} */
WHERE pay_ref_id = :P4 /* {{GetRechTrans.id}} */

UPDATE tt_recharge_trans
SET closing_balance = :P1 /* {{RTClosingBalOld}} */, status = :P2 /* {{'FAILED'}} */, live = :P3 /* {{'Push'}} */, updated_on = :P4 /* {{NOW}} */, operator_ref = :P5 /* {{'Transaction Failed'}} */
WHERE id = :P6 /* {{GetRechTrans.id}} */

UPDATE tt_balance
SET updated_on = :P1 /* {{NOW}} */, status = :P2 /* {{'FAILED'}} */, updated_by = :P3 /* {{identity}} */
WHERE pay_ref_id = :P4 /* {{GetRechTrans.id}} */

values.value: {{'Number: '+GetRechTrans.user_number+' | Amount: '+GetRechTrans.amount+' | Recharge Refund | Ref. Id: '+GetRechTrans.id+' | Order Id: '+GetRechTrans.tr_id+' | Comm Per: '+GetRechTrans.comm_per+' | Comm Val: '+GetRechTrans.comm_val+' | Charge Per: '+GetRechTrans.charge_per+' | Charge Val:  '+GetRechTrans.other_charge+' | GST: 00.00 | TDS: 00.00 | Net Amt. '+GetRechTrans.net_amt}}

sql.query:
INSERT INTO tt_balance
(user_id, old_balance, amount, new_balance, transaction_type, tr_date, ip_address, crdr_type, pay_ref_id, remarks, created_by, created_on, netamt, status) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetRechTrans.user_id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetRechTrans.balance_amt}} */, :P3 /* {{GetRechTrans.amount}} */, :P4 /* {{RTClosingBal}} */, :P5 /* {{'Recharge Refund'}} */, :P6 /* {{NOW}} */, :P7 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P8 /* {{'Credit'}} */, :P9 /* {{GetRechTrans.id}} */, :P10 /* {{'Number: '+GetRechTrans.user_number+' | Amount: '+GetRechTrans.amount+' | Recharge Refund | Ref. Id: '+GetRechTrans.id+' | Order Id: '+GetRechTrans.tr_id+' | Comm Per: '+GetRechTrans.comm_per+' | Comm Val: '+GetRechTrans.comm_val+' | Charge Per: '+GetRechTrans.charge_per+' | Charge Val:  '+GetRechTrans.other_charge+' | GST: 00.00 | TDS: 00.00 | Net Amt. '+GetRechTrans.net_amt}} */, :P11 /* {{identity}} */, :P12 /* {{NOW}} */, :P13 /* {{GetRechTrans.net_amt}} */, :P14 /* {{'REFUND'}} */)

params.name: :P10
params.value: {{'Number: '+GetRechTrans.user_number+' | Amount: '+GetRechTrans.amount+' | Recharge Refund | Ref. Id: '+GetRechTrans.id+' | Order Id: '+GetRechTrans.tr_id+' | Comm Per: '+GetRechTrans.comm_per+' | Comm Val: '+GetRechTrans.comm_val+' | Charge Per: '+GetRechTrans.charge_per+' | Charge Val:  '+GetRechTrans.other_charge+' | GST: 00.00 | TDS: 00.00 | Net Amt. '+GetRechTrans.net_amt}}

sql.query:
UPDATE m_users
SET balance_amt = :P1 /* {{RTClosingBal}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{GetRechTrans.user_id}} */

SELECT balance_amt AS dt_balance
FROM m_users AS m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{GetRechTrans.ds_id}} */

values.value: {{'Recharge Comm Reversal | Amount:  '+GetRechTrans.amount+' | Charge & Comm Debit: '+DTNetAmt+' | Ref. Id:\n '+GetRechTrans.id}}

sql.query:
INSERT INTO t_charge_cal
(user_id, old_balance, amount, netamt, new_balance, transaction_type, tr_date, ip_address, crdr_type, pay_ref_id, remarks, created_by, created_on) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetRechTrans.ds_id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetDT.dt_balance}} */, :P3 /* {{GetRechTrans.amount}} */, :P4 /* {{DTNetAmt}} */, :P5 /* {{DTClosingBal}} */, :P6 /* {{'Recharge Comm Reversal'}} */, :P7 /* {{NOW}} */, :P8 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P9 /* {{'Debit'}} */, :P10 /* {{GetRechTrans.id}} */, :P11 /* {{'Recharge Comm Reversal | Amount:  '+GetRechTrans.amount+' | Charge & Comm Debit: '+DTNetAmt+' | Ref. Id:\n '+GetRechTrans.id}} */, :P12 /* {{identity}} */, :P13 /* {{NOW}} */)

params.name: :P11
params.value: {{'Recharge Comm Reversal | Amount:  '+GetRechTrans.amount+' | Charge & Comm Debit: '+DTNetAmt+' | Ref. Id:\n '+GetRechTrans.id}}

UPDATE m_users
SET balance_amt = :P1 /* {{DTClosingBal}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{GetRechTrans.ds_id}} */

SELECT balance_amt AS mdt_balance
FROM m_users AS m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{GetRechTrans.md_id}} */

sql.query:
UPDATE m_users
SET balance_amt = :P1 /* {{MDTClosingBal}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{GetRechTrans.md_id}} */

UPDATE tt_recharge_trans
SET closing_balance = :P1 /* {{RTClosingBalOld}} */, status = :P2 /* {{'SUCCESS'}} */, api_ref = :P3 /* {{$_POST.api_ref}} */, live = :P4 /* {{'Push'}} */, updated_on = :P5 /* {{NOW}} */, operator_ref = :P6 /* {{'Transaction Successful'}} */
WHERE id = :P7 /* {{GetRechTrans.id}} */
